p: 42 adults with Type 2 Diabetes diagnosed within 10 years, currently on metformin (1000–2000 mg/day) were enrolled. Subjects were between 40 and 70 years of age, with a BMI of 25–39.9 kg/m 2, and a HbA1C between 6.0 and 9.0%. Additional inclusion/exclusion criteria can be found in Additional file 1: Appendix S1. This study consisted of a single site at The GW Medical Faculty Associates.
